messages.subject: parents and their so called rights
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/27/02 3:17:17 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/27/02 3:17:17 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< You know what I think? I dont' think the right to vote should be based on
age, but I think each election, to get into the polls the voter should take
a
test of some sort to prove he has the slightest clue what's going on and
who's who. >>

I agree!! I sat and watched a lady have her boyfriend or dh tell her what to
vote on one time up in OR. It was a local election and they didn't have poll
booths, it was SO incredibly annoying to me.

Ren
